statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT location_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT MIN(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) AS year, AVG(energy_usage) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY year;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) = 6;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) = 15;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_energy_usage > 500
SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28'
SELECT location_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id HAVING max_energy_usage > 200
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_records > 5
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) AS year FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY year
SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY avg_energy_usage DESC
SELECT location_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location_id) AS unique_locations FROM EnergyConsumptionData

SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31' GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_energy_usage > 1000
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE location_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001') ORDER BY location_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT location_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY avg_energy_usage ASC
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 150 GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT datetime, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) FROM energy_consumption_data;

SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT MIN(energy_reading) FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM energy_consumption_trends;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE start_datetime < '2022-06-01';
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) AS MaxEnergy, MIN(energy_reading) AS MinEnergy FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS TrendCount FROM energy_consumption_trends GROUP BY trend_name;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS AvgEnergy, MAX(energy_reading) AS MaxEnergy, MIN(energy_reading) AS MinEnergy FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT datetime, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading < 50 OR energy_reading > 150;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE end_datetime IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS AvgEnergy FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY DATE(datetime);
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS TrendCount FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_name IN ('Trend1', 'Trend2', 'Trend3');
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100
SELECT datetime, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS average_energy FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > (SELECT AVG(energy_reading) FROM energy_consumption_data)
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE start_datetime BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM energy_consumption_trends GROUP BY trend_name
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_consumption_trends ORDER BY trend_name ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE datetime IN (SELECT start_datetime FROM energy_consumption_trends)
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS average_energy, MONTH(datetime) AS month FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY month

SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE end_datetime IS NULL
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE end_datetime IS NULL GROUP BY trend_name
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy, MIN(energy_reading) AS min_energy FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT DISTINCT DATE(datetime) AS date FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT SUM(energy_reading) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS average_energy, DATE(datetime) AS date FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY date
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE datetime < (SELECT MAX(end_datetime) FROM energy_consumption_trends)
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'A%' GROUP BY trend_name
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data

SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;

SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 100;

SELECT timestamp, device_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id

SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Meter'

SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT source_id FROM energy_sources)
SELECT device_id, device_type, location FROM devices UNION SELECT source_id, source_name, NULL FROM energy_sources
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_sources JOIN energy_consumption ON source_id = device_id GROUP BY source_name
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id = (SELECT MAX(source_id) FROM energy_sources)

SELECT month_id, year, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_by_month WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT year, total_energy FROM energy_consumption_by_year WHERE total_energy > 1000;
SELECT region_id, year, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_by_region WHERE region_id = 1;

SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM energy_consumption_trends;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, value FROM energy_consumption_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, value FROM energy_consumption_metrics WHERE trend_id = 7;
SELECT trend_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS num_metrics FROM energy_consumption_metrics GROUP BY trend_id;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, value FROM energy_consumption_metrics ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_by_month WHERE month_id = 3 AND year = 2022;
SELECT year, SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy_sum FROM energy_consumption_by_year GROUP BY year;
SELECT region_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage FROM energy_consumption_by_region GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT year, COUNT(*) AS num_regions FROM energy_consumption_by_region GROUP BY year;

SELECT trend_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM energy_consumption_metrics GROUP BY trend_id;
SELECT year, MAX(total_energy) AS max_energy FROM energy_consumption_by_year;

SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS num_metrics FROM energy_consumption_trends INNER JOIN energy_consumption_metrics ON energy_consumption_trends.trend_id = energy_consumption_metrics.trend_id GROUP BY trend_name;

SELECT trend_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM energy_consumption_metrics INNER JOIN energy_consumption_trends ON energy_consumption_metrics.trend_id = energy_consumption_trends.trend_id GROUP BY trend_name;
SELECT region_id, year, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_by_region WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_by_month WHERE year = 2021 AND energy_usage > 100
SELECT region_id, year, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption_by_region GROUP BY region_id, year
SELECT e.year, e.total_energy, m.metric_name, m.value FROM energy_consumption_by_year e INNER JOIN energy_consumption_metrics m ON e.year = m.trend_id WHERE m.value > 500
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_by_month
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(metric_id) AS metric_count FROM energy_consumption_trends t INNER JOIN energy_consumption_metrics m ON t.trend_id = m.trend_id GROUP BY trend_name

SELECT t.trend_name, COUNT(m.metric_id) AS metric_count FROM energy_consumption_trends t LEFT JOIN energy_consumption_metrics m ON t.trend_id = m.trend_id GROUP BY t.trend_name

SELECT DISTINCT region_id FROM energy_consumption_by_region ORDER BY region_id DESC

SELECT trend_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS metric_count FROM energy_consumption_metrics GROUP BY trend_id
